project.name: 9flats.com
project.description: 9flats.com gives you the chance to visit unique and beautiful places all over the world and to rent out your own flat.
project.what_we_did: Railslove kick-started this one back in 2010 and is part of the development team ever since. It's an awe-inspiring experience to work with such a vibrant start-up
